lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The OECD, in its semi-annual review of the world economy, said a failure of the Reagan Administration and Congress quickly to agree on measures to cut the deficit "could seriously affect confidence, both in the United States and elsewhere."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The United States should take urgent action to cut its crippling budget deficit, including possible reductions in non-defense spending, higher taxes and curbs on growth of the defense budget, the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Monetary and fiscal policy appear to be the key factors behind the avoidance of recession," the report said.
